<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Azarketi Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2671) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Absalom, City of Lost Omens](/Sources.aspx?ID=108) pg. 394, [Azarketi Ancestry Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=76) pg. 4</row>

</column>

---

You are familiar with weapons that excel underwater. You are trained with [crossbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67), [hand crossbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69), [longspears](/Weapons.aspx?ID=6), [spears](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10), and [tridents](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45). In addition, you gain access to all uncommon [azarketi](/Traits.aspx?ID=336) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial azarketi weapons are simple weapons and advanced azarketi weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Azarketi Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Azarketi Weapon Aptitude](/Feats.aspx?ID=2675), [Azarketi Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2680)
name: Azarketi Weapon Familiarity
